        void updatePosition(java.lang.String position,

        Parameters:

        figureID - the ID of the thief

      • getPossiblePositions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getPossiblePositions()
        get all the possible positions as hashmap with figure ID as key and it's positions as value
        Returns:
        the positions of the thiefs as hashmap with id as key and positions as value

      • getAllPossiblePositions
